Reviews.Title: “My Stay”
Reviews.Author: nllyons
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel recently staff welcoming bedrooms clean equipped position excellent close kings cross station major london sites particular square hotel situated quiet superb amenity especially summer months hope

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for location and price”
Reviews.Author: bandearg
Reviews.Content: straight road kings crossst pancras station 5 minute walk euston hotel newly perfect tiny amount time staying definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Be warned!”
Reviews.Author: Numberw0man
Reviews.Content: hotel website parking free weekend arriving car friday night emailed hotel parking night response free 630pm til 830am saturday morning translated free friday 630pm weekend stated website howeverwe found restrictions saturday 830am till 130pm parking residents means intended saturday leave car parked impossible pay car park 830am till 130pm interrupt day sightseeing move car free parking outside hotel paying hours leave car pay car park rest day possibly night incorrect piece advice hotel concern specifically chosen hotel free weekend parking offering implied website else hotel pales comparison inconvenience

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: sarahNorwich86
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel reasonable rate comfortable clean nicely decorated little bit noisy guests arrived late cant complain adequate breakfast friendly staff check reception partner hotel road pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “A place to put your head”
Reviews.Author: Buster1980
Reviews.Content: hotel close proximity st pancras international train station kings cross situated worth noting reception hotel situated road melville door albion wasnt little isolated night single female didnt feel completely safe people hanging returned night front door keyed own guess ok didnt feel safe single tiny london pay bath towel bath mat hand towel bar soap towels wont changed daily clean red doona cover dont changed guest wifi didnt try breakfast upside staff helpful satisfied literally head

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is good for a business trip stay.”
Reviews.Author: TessaD20
Reviews.Content: booked hotel price ok booked late night twin check melville hotel round corner fortunately aware reading reviews otherwise bit clean tv free wifi access bathroom fine didnt experience service cant comment location minutes walk kings cross station night people park bit noise annoying night fine unlucky overall id stay business trip fine

Reviews.Title: “DISCUSTING!”
Reviews.Author: xLYNDSAYx
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night looking internet booked hotel looked nice cleanliness husband ill looked clean tidy ready arrived dirty ceiling fan friends choked amount dust bathroom hardly round husband stayed basement booked booked 7 weeks advance stunk ala smoking stay breakfast vile boiled eggs black middle choice food beans cold cutlery dirty selves favour dont stay am stuck own bum atall clean stay esspecially â£100 night

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms for an excellent price, My friends and I we're impressed!!”
Reviews.Author: MichaelFraser
Reviews.Content: stayed friends perfect nice excellent location easy country mind london location walking distance pubs tube banks shops currency exchange fast food resturants quick food morning minutes tube centre city excellent hotel feel welcome friendly staff nice stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Balance between budget and style”
Reviews.Author: nikkibarbourella
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent location kings cross station stayed business trip london clean bed firm sheets clean breakfast sufficient staff friendly wifi flat screen tv en suite bathroom booked throught hotels website night excellent value happy hotel hair straighteners left mine home disaster avoided meeting succesful ll positive expreience hassle free reccomend colleagues friends return soon

Reviews.Title: “well located, but not satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: EricAshley47
Reviews.Content: stayed overnight leaving eurostar wed booked paid twin line checked instructed sister hotel told vacated offered singles floors apart accepted argument refund leaving alternative otherwise clean nicely decorated handy station breakfast included basic

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT BOOK HERE or with the Melville Hotel Group!”
Reviews.Author: Merynne
Reviews.Content: booked hotel based pictures website star rating inclusions booked lovely refurbished hotel ensuite book albion house hotel melville hotel reception told bumped excelsior hotel doors checked hotels register booking albion house hotel booked directly website inspected below ground security windows musty ensuite joined 10 metre corridor bed hour arguing reception clerk touch manager refurbished ensuite melville hotel discounted rate time travel uk booking larger wellknown hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location for a visit to London”
Reviews.Author: NZGill
Reviews.Content: spent 10 days albion house hotel actually staying excelsior houses argyle square owned albion house adequate tv wide choice channels free wifi wasnt strong bathroom adequate towels changed daily quiet square quiet location dont noise hotel breakfast dining basement albion food pretty bit monotonous staff friendly professional dining pretty hotel idea breakfast otherwise wait seat main plus hotel minutes walk kings cross station placed getting heathrow taking tube lot buses past kings cross double decker london recommended oyster card location italian indian restaurants nearby laundromat brunswick shopping centre theres cinema playing foreign films couple restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money; helpful people”
Reviews.Author: James5353
Reviews.Content: arrival found staff friendly helpful respect single excelsior paces albion including welcome tea coffee facilities bed comfortable slept indeed hotel peaceful square noise disruption late night morning extremely situated kings cross st pancras railway stations added considered value money happily stay
